languages.text: {n}С отстраненным удивлением вы наблюдаете за тем, как медленно плывут в воздухе капли чего-то алого. Это ваша кровь? За когтистой рукой, вскрывшей ваше горло молниеносным ударом, тянется багровый шлейф. Удивление — последняя эмоция, которая остается в вашем навечно гаснущем сознании.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}С отстраненным удивлением вы наблюдаете за тем, как медленно плывут в воздухе капли чего-то алого. Это ваша кровь? За когтистой рукой, вскрывшей ваше горло молниеносным ударом, тянется багровый шлейф. Удивление — последняя эмоция, которая остается в вашем навечно гаснущем сознании.{/n}
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: {n}You watch in detached surprise as drops of something red spray slowly through the air. Is that your blood? The clawed hand that has sliced open your throat leaves behind a crimson trail. Surprise is the last emotion you feel before your consciousness goes dark for good.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}С отстраненным удивлением вы наблюдаете за тем, как медленно плывут в воздухе капли чего-то алого. Это ваша кровь? За когтистой рукой, вскрывшей ваше горло молниеносным ударом, тянется багровый шлейф. Удивление — последняя эмоция, которая остается в вашем навечно гаснущем сознании.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}With detached surprise, you watch as drops of red flow slowly through the air. Is that your blood? The clawed hand that has sliced your throat open leaves behind a crimson trail. Surprise is the last emotion that sparks in your forever fading mind.{/n}
traits.speaker: Anger

traits.locale_text: {n}With detached surprise, you watch as drops of red flow slowly through the air. Is that your blood? The clawed hand that has sliced your throat open leaves behind a crimson trail. Surprise is the last emotion that sparks in your forever fading mind.{/n}
traits.speaker: Anger

traits.locale_text: {n}You watch in detached surprise as drops of something red spray slowly through the air. Is that your blood? The clawed hand that has sliced open your throat leaves behind a crimson trail. Surprise is the last emotion you feel before your consciousness goes dark for good.{/n}
traits.speaker: Anger

traits.locale_text: {n}You watch in detached surprise as drops of something red spray slowly through the air. Is that your blood? The clawed hand that has sliced open your throat leaves behind a crimson trail. Surprise is the last emotion you feel before your consciousness goes dark for good.{/n}
traits.speaker: Anger

traits.locale_text: {n}You watch in detached surprise as drops of something red spray slowly through the air. Is that your blood? The clawed hand that has sliced open your throat leaves behind a crimson trail. Surprise is the last emotion you feel before your consciousness goes dark for good.{/n}
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: {n}你惊讶地看着一滴滴红色的东西从空中缓缓地喷了出来，那是你的血吗？那只利爪切开了你的喉咙，留下了深红色的痕迹。你感到惊讶不已，随后，你的意识便永远沉入了黑暗之中。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You watch in detached surprise as drops of something red spray slowly through the air. Is that your blood? The clawed hand that has sliced open your throat leaves behind a crimson trail. Surprise is the last emotion you feel before your consciousness goes dark for good.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你惊讶地看着一滴滴红色的东西从空中缓缓地喷了出来，那是你的血吗？那只利爪切开了你的喉咙，留下了深红色的痕迹。你感到惊讶不已，随后，你的意识便永远沉入了黑暗之中。{/n}
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: {n}Observas con sorpresa cómo unas gotas de algo rojizo llenan el aire. ¿Es tu sangre? La mano terminada en garras que te ha rajado la garganta deja una estela carmesí. Lo último que sientes antes de perder el conocimiento por última vez es sorpresa.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You watch in detached surprise as drops of something red spray slowly through the air. Is that your blood? The clawed hand that has sliced open your throat leaves behind a crimson trail. Surprise is the last emotion you feel before your consciousness goes dark for good.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Observas con sorpresa cómo unas gotas de algo rojizo llenan el aire. ¿Es tu sangre? La mano terminada en garras que te ha rajado la garganta deja una estela carmesí. Lo último que sientes antes de perder el conocimiento por última vez es sorpresa.{/n}
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: {n}驚きを隠せないまま、赤いしぶきが宙を舞うのを見ていた。これは自分の血だろうか？喉を切り裂いた鋭い爪が真紅の糸を引いている。驚いたまま、意識が完全に暗転していくのを感じた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You watch in detached surprise as drops of something red spray slowly through the air. Is that your blood? The clawed hand that has sliced open your throat leaves behind a crimson trail. Surprise is the last emotion you feel before your consciousness goes dark for good.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}驚きを隠せないまま、赤いしぶきが宙を舞うのを見ていた。これは自分の血だろうか？喉を切り裂いた鋭い爪が真紅の糸を引いている。驚いたまま、意識が完全に暗転していくのを感じた。{/n}
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: {n}Du siehst mit distanzierter Überraschung zu, wie Tropfen einer roten Flüssigkeit langsam durch die Luft spritzen. Ist das dein Blut? Die krallenbesetzte Hand, die deine Kehle aufgeschlitzt hat, hinterlässt eine rote Spur. Überraschung ist die letzte Emotion, die du empfindest, bevor ewige Dunkelheit dein Bewusstsein übermannt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You watch in detached surprise as drops of something red spray slowly through the air. Is that your blood? The clawed hand that has sliced open your throat leaves behind a crimson trail. Surprise is the last emotion you feel before your consciousness goes dark for good.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du siehst mit distanzierter Überraschung zu, wie Tropfen einer roten Flüssigkeit langsam durch die Luft spritzen. Ist das dein Blut? Die krallenbesetzte Hand, die deine Kehle aufgeschlitzt hat, hinterlässt eine rote Spur. Überraschung ist die letzte Emotion, die du empfindest, bevor ewige Dunkelheit dein Bewusstsein übermannt.{/n}
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: {n}Avec un détachement étonné, vous voyez des gouttes rouges jaillir au ralenti. Est-ce votre sang ? La main griffue qui vous a tranché la gorge laisse derrière elle une traînée écarlate. La surprise est la dernière émotion que vous ressentez avant que votre conscience ne s'éteigne à jamais.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You watch in detached surprise as drops of something red spray slowly through the air. Is that your blood? The clawed hand that has sliced open your throat leaves behind a crimson trail. Surprise is the last emotion you feel before your consciousness goes dark for good.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Avec un détachement étonné, vous voyez des gouttes rouges jaillir au ralenti. Est-ce votre sang ? La main griffue qui vous a tranché la gorge laisse derrière elle une traînée écarlate. La surprise est la dernière émotion que vous ressentez avant que votre conscience ne s'éteigne à jamais.{/n}
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: {n}Kızıl renkte bir şeylerin havada yavaşça uçuştuğunu görünce şaşıp kalıyorsun. Senin kanın mı bu? Boğazını parçalayan pençeler, ardında kızıl bir iz bırakıyor. Bilincini temelli kaybetmeden evvel hissettiğin son duygu, şaşkınlık oluyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You watch in detached surprise as drops of something red spray slowly through the air. Is that your blood? The clawed hand that has sliced open your throat leaves behind a crimson trail. Surprise is the last emotion you feel before your consciousness goes dark for good.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Kızıl renkte bir şeylerin havada yavaşça uçuştuğunu görünce şaşırıp kalıyorsun. Senin kanın mı bu? Boğazını parçalayan pençeler, arkada kızıl bir iz bırakıyor. Bilincini temelli kaybetmeden evvel hissettiğin son duygu şaşkınlık oluyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: Anger
